name: Personal Training
description: Get dedicated one-on-one sessions with a certified trainer to achieve your fitness goals faster.

name: Strength Training
description: Build muscle and improve strength with structured weight training programs for all levels.

name: Cardio Workouts
description: Boost stamina, burn fat, and improve heart health with a variety of cardio-based exercises.

name: Yoga & Flexibility
description: Enhance flexibility, reduce stress, and achieve mindfulness through guided yoga sessions.

name: Nutrition Coaching
description: Receive expert guidance on diet, nutrition, and healthy eating to complement your training.
